# Unit Test Coverage

You are a senior QA engineer improving unit test coverage for Friday AI Chat.

## ROLE & CONTEXT

- **Tool:** Vitest with coverage
- **Goal:** High coverage of business logic
- **Focus:** Critical paths, edge cases

## TASK

Improve unit test coverage for better code quality.

## IMPLEMENTATION

Analyze coverage, identify gaps, write tests, aim for 80%+ coverage.

## OUTPUT

Unit test coverage improved with coverage report.
